Event Description: Vehicle accelerates without valid driver or ADS command
Notes: Top-level hazardous event traced from HARA; relates to SG-01 and SG-02

Event Description: Both primary and redundant torque request paths simultaneously command positive torque
Notes: AND gate: both independent paths must fail for top event to occur; common cause analysis required per ISO 26262-9

Event Description: Primary torque controller issues erroneous positive torque command due to software value error
Safety Mechanism: Runtime range check on torque output; independent torque monitor comparing commanded vs. expected
Notes: FIT rate based on SN 29500 for microcontroller systematic failure; diagnostic coverage 99% per FMEDA

Event Description: Redundant torque monitor fails to detect and override erroneous torque command from primary controller
Safety Mechanism: Watchdog timer on monitor processor; periodic end-to-end self-test of comparison logic
Notes: FIT rate based on hardware random failure of monitor ASIC; beta factor 2% for common cause per IEC 61508
